mobile.name: gwydion guard royal
mobile.long_description: Gwydion the Royal Guard is here on duty.
mobile.description: As all members of the Guard, Gwydion wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. He seems very well trained, and moves like an experienced fighter.

mobile.name: king welmar
mobile.long_description: The wise King Welmar sits here in his throne.
mobile.description: In his later middle-age, with his beard starting to grey, King Welmar is still very powerfully built, and wouldn't take kindly to an attack. Despite that, you know he is well-loved throughout the land, and has a reputation as a wise and just ruler.

mobile.long_description: You hear a frightening wail, and see a horrible ghost approaching.
mobile.description: The ghost is almost translucent, and looks really SCARY!

mobile.name: peter captain guard royal
mobile.short_description: Peter, the Captain of the Royal Guard
mobile.long_description: Peter, the Captain of the Royal Guard, walks around inspecting.
mobile.description: As all members of the Guard, Peter wears the chain mail required of them as uniform. Even though all the other guards seem well trained, you realise none of them would stand a chance against this man in a fight. He stands at least two metres tall, but still moves with an almost feline grace. He actually radiates strength and confidence, and you have to fight a sudden urge to come to attention as you see him.

mobile.name: master trainingmaster
mobile.long_description: The Training Master is here, supervising.
mobile.description: Aged, but experienced, the Training Master is skilled in the use of virtually every weapon type invented by Man.

mobile.name: herald royal
mobile.long_description: The Royal Herald is standing here.
mobile.description: This is a young, powerfully built man, whose primary function is to make Royal Announcements.

mobile.name: ergan murderer
mobile.long_description: Slumped in a corner you see Ergan, aka the Murderer of Townsbridge.
mobile.description: You remember a time almost a decade ago, when the news of the day was how this man had slaughtered the entire population of the little village of Townsbridge. He was imprisoned, and here he is - a shadow of the undoubtedly great warrior he once was, but still to be reckoned with.

mobile.name: butler james
mobile.long_description: James the Butler is standing here, looking pompous.
mobile.description: The typical perfect butler: upper middle age, a bit bald and with an impressive belly.

mobile.name: woman cleaning
mobile.long_description: There is a Cleaning Woman here, trying not be noticed.
mobile.description: Although she has a menial job, she seems to like it.

mobile.name: cockroach roach
mobile.long_description: A large cockroach is crawling by the wall.
mobile.description: Very large indeed, and they say cockroaches are hard to kill...

mobile.name: astrologer
mobile.long_description: The Astrologer is sitting here, studying a book.
mobile.description: He is old and white-haired, with a long beard. As you see him, you can almost believe the rumours about stars deciding Fate, and that astrology is capable of seeing the future.

mobile.name: tim guard lifeguard
mobile.long_description: Tim, the King's Lifeguard, is standing here.
mobile.description: This guy looks just like his twin, Tom. There seems to be no doubt that he is completely prepared to give his life for the King, if necessary.

mobile.name: tom guard lifeguard

mobile.name: chef cook
mobile.long_description: The Chef is here, shouting orders to the other cooks.
mobile.description: It seems he has been tasting his own food a bit too enthusiastically. He is, in other words, a bit fat.

mobile.name: cook
mobile.long_description: There is a cook here, making himself busy with a pot.
mobile.description: A junior cook, eager to do the Chef's bidding.

mobile.name: david man guard
mobile.long_description: David, a big, mean-looking man, stands here, guarding the door.
mobile.description: He really is big, and you get the feeling he wouldn't take kindly to an attempt to get past him.

mobile.long_description: A zombie is shambling over some corpses here, moving quite silently.
mobile.description: It is entirely possible that this zombie was once one of the villagers of Townsbridge who has been brought to an undead life by a fuelling desire for revenge.

mobile.description: It is entirely possible that this skeleton was once one of the villagers of Townsbridge who has been brought to an undead life by a fuelling desire for revenge.

mobile.name: pit fiend demon
mobile.long_description: A large demon surrounded by flames rises out of the dark pool.
mobile.description: It is a horrifying thing, this demonic creature from the depths of the Abyss. It glares down at you through blood-red eyes, and bares its huge white fangs and its razor-sharp talons.
